note.query: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DM.FCT_order where Channel_ID=0;
note.title: [Notification] 订单存在未mapping的Channel_ID，请检查
note.body:
SELECT sd_id,* FROM ods.ods.OMS_Order_Info
WHERE deal_code IN ( SELECT Trans_No FROM DM.FCT_order where Channel_ID=0 ) ORDER BY 1
以及修改 [dm].[SP_Fct_Order_Update]中的Channel_ID定义，添加未map的Channel_ID
